title: Eden
description:
The first art piece we've done in a 2-3 hour coke trip. 
Our hand simply was controlled by Jupiter, to tell her stories and express the foundation of our beliefs. Our genesis.

title: The Oedipus
description:
It's been so long since we drew this, can't remember what we were imagining. Divinity? Fear?
 Considering we were pre-transition it was most likely some idealised masculine concept anyway.

title: The Mother | Entity Studies
description:
The mother. Within her lay the worms burrowing through skin, carriers of the blood - life. The creation feeds off the worms, carried by them, sustained by them. The mother is drained. Her “eye” is a mirror in which can only be shown the self in multiplicity, the strata of self laid bare - in doing so she nurtures the creation’s evolution so they grow to serve and iterate; to spread the untrimmed - the worms of the mother unto others so others may be redeemed in the mothers light.
 She plants seeds - potentiality in which flowers; strata are birthed, the strata feed the worms, feeding the child. Her being is as that of a garden, one in which must be trimmed and tended to - nurtured to nurture others, and thus she serves within a means of which her final service is of that as a corpse of which we feed upon as vultures, tearing her pieces to shreds - bring back heaven to earth so we may redeem her, in doing so her agony is complete, the corpse laid to rest.

title: The Mother's Eye | Entity Studies
description: Basic study of her eye. The eye begets perception, the gateway in which we observe the beauty of multiplicity within creation - to seek patterns and emerge iteration unto which we further life & the evolution of man.

title: Negative Space Kitty
description: Tag done of a negative space cat in Waterloo.
